concept.title: Getting familiar with Sametime API Documentation
concept.shortdesc: Depending on your Sametime subscription, the following REST APIs and SDK may be available in your environment. For more information, contact HCL Customer Support.

ol.li: REST APIs—With the exception of the Client Platform SDK, the left-hand navigator contains a list of different API areas—most of which are tied to a specific service.

Client Platform SDK—The Client Platform SDK provides a collection of components and widgets that consumers can add to their web applications. It also provides a Javascript API for web developers and sample pages showing much of this functionality. For more information, refer to .
Endpoints—For each service area, there are Swagger pages that can be used to interact with the server. The endpoints each represent individual REST API calls or requests that the API server supports.
Authorize button—Sametime uses cookies or bearer tokens for authorization. For more information, refer to .
Schemas—Schemas show how data is structured and provide developers with information about the request.
OpenAPI definitions—A link that opens the OpenAPI definition in either JSON (Chat API) or YAML (all other services).
Service—This section describes the service that the API endpoint is tied to.
Servers—This section specifies the API server and base URL.
